SEARCH
Package handler

Class DisplayHandler

Object
DisplayHandler
public class DisplayHandler extends Object
Handles the displaying and printing of information onto the terminal.
Contains a series of overloaded methods called displayResult

    Displays information about a single suggestion, as well as its Status, whether it has been approved, rejected or pending
    static void
    displayResult(ArrayList<Camp> camps)
    Does not display all information of the camp Mainly used to display basic information for non-owners of a camp to see
    static void

    Displays a list of camps a certain user has signed up for, as well as his/her role Role either as: Committee Member or Attendee

    • displayResult

      public static void displayResult(Enquiry enquiry)
      Displays information about a single enquiry.
      This includes the original content of that enquiry as well as replies, if there are any.
      Parameters:
      enquiry -

    • displayResult

    • displayResult

      public static void displayResult(ArrayList<Student> students, ArrayList<CommitteeMember> commMembers)
      Displays a list of signups from a particular camp.
      The signups are split into a list of committee members and attendees.
      Parameters:
      students - an ArrayList
      commMembers - an ArrayList
